feed.title: Track Awesome Preact Updates Daily

entry.title: Awesome Preact Updates on May 01, 2023
entry.content:
Contents / Example Apps

  • Play.cash üé∂ (GitHub Project (‚≠ê92))
  • Songsterr üéº Using Preact X in production since 10.0 alpha
  • BitMidi üéπ Wayback machine for free MIDI files (GitHub Project (‚≠ê588))
  • Ultimate Guitar üé∏speed boosted by Preact.
  • ESBench is built using Preact.
  • BigWebQuiz (GitHub Project (‚≠ê109))
  • Nectarine.rocks (GitHub Project (‚≠ê62)) üçë
  • OSS.Ninja (GitHub Project (‚≠ê147))
  • GuriVR (GitHub Project (‚≠ê194))
  • Offline Gallery (GitHub Project (‚≠ê95)) üéà
  • Periodic Weather (GitHub Project (‚≠ê58)) ‚òÄÔ∏è
  • Rugby News Board (GitHub Project) (‚≠ê7)
  • Preact Gallery an 8KB photo gallery PWA built using Preact.
  • Rainbow Explorer Preact app to translate real life color to digital color (Github project (‚≠ê27)).
  • YASCC Yet Another SoundCloud Client (Github project (‚≠ê35)).
  • Journalize 14k offline-capable journaling PWA using preact. (Github project (‚≠ê37)).
  • Proxx A game of proximity by GoogleChromeLabs using preact. (Github project (‚≠ê1.3k)).
  • Web Maker An offline and blazing fast frontend playground built using Preact. (Github project (‚≠ê2.6k)).
  • Intergram A live chat widget linked to your Telegram messenger built using Preact. (Github project (‚≠ê1.4k)).
  • Preact App in ES6 without Babel or JSX (GitHub Project (‚≠ê7)).
  • GHFresh Monitor GitHub repository releases ‚Äì Prerendering with Preact. Built with Preact Compat, TypeScript, Material-UI and Redux Toolkit. (GitHub Project (‚≠ê8)).
  • Passwords Fountain - modern & performant password manager interface which works everywhere (Github project (‚≠ê64)).
  • macOS Web - macOS Big Sur Desktop experience for Web, built with Preact and Vite (Github project (‚≠ê1k)).
  • Cinemate - Movie Recommender System built with Preact and TypeScript. Backend written in Rust.
  • Windows 11 Web - Awe-amazing Windows 11 clone for the web! ‚ö° (Github project (‚≠ê587)).
  • Idea Keeper üß† Highly extensible and minimalistic idea keeping app (GitHub Project (‚≠ê1)).

entry.title: Awesome Preact Updates on Jun 08, 2022
entry.content:
Contents / Components

  • Preact Compat (‚≠ê947) - Use any React library with Preact (full example (‚≠ê54)).
  • Preact Render To String (‚≠ê685) - Universal rendering.
  • Preact Markup (‚≠ê204) - Render HTML & Custom Elements as JSX & Components.
  • Preact Portal (‚≠ê181) - Render Preact components into (a) SPACE.
  • Preact Richtextarea (‚≠ê43) - Simple HTML editor component.
  • Preact Cycle (‚≠ê139) - Functional-reactive paradigm for Preact.
  • Preact MUI (‚≠ê37) - The MUI CSS Preact library.
  • Preact MDL (‚≠ê189) - Use MDL as Preact components.
  • Preact Photon (‚≠ê179) - Build beautiful desktop UI with photon.

Contents / Testing Utils

  • Preact JSX Chai (‚≠ê56) - JSX assertion testing (no DOM, right in Node).

entry.title: Awesome Preact Updates on Jul 28, 2017
entry.content:
Contents / Boilerplates

  • Official Boilerplate (‚≠ê964) - Ready-to-rock Preact starter project, powered by Webpack.
  • Preact Simple Starter (‚≠ê64) - PWA Simple Starter with Preact, Preact-mdl and Webpack2.
  • Preact PWA (‚≠ê512) - PWA focused on raw performance, server side rendering, prerendering, redux, express, rollup.

Contents / Routing

  • Preact Router (‚≠ê1k) - URL router for Preact.

Contents / Components

  • Preact Token Input (‚≠ê63) - Text field that tokenizes input, for things like tags.
  • Preact Virtual List (‚≠ê228) - Easily render lists with millions of rows (demo).
  • Preact Layout - Small and simple layout library.
  • Preact Socrates (‚≠ê16) - Preact plugin for Socrates (‚≠ê576).
  • Preact Flyd (‚≠ê11) - Use flyd (‚≠ê1.6k) FRP streams in Preact + JSX.
  • Preact I18nline (‚≠ê38) - Integrates the ecosystem around i18n-js (‚≠ê10) with Preact via i18nline (‚≠ê19).
  • Preact Classless Component (‚≠ê44) - Create preact components without the class keyword.
  • Preact Hyperscript (‚≠ê33) - Hyperscript-like syntax for creating elements.
  • Shallow Compare (‚≠ê34) - Simplified shouldComponentUpdate helper.
  • Preact Codemod (‚≠ê40) - Transform your React code to Preact.
  • Preact Helmet (‚≠ê85) - A document head manager for Preact.
  • Preact Delegate (‚≠ê19) - Delegate DOM events.
  • Preact No SSR (‚≠ê8) - Skip Server Side Rendering of Components.

Contents / Articles

  • Building a Small PWA with Preact and Firebase
  • Authentication with Auth0

Contents / Example Apps

  • Colors App (‚≠ê98) - PWA for copying values from popular color palettes. Supports HEX, RGB, and HSL formats.
  • Tracks (‚≠ê16) - PWA for tracking things in general. Gdrive Sync.

Contents / Related Libraries

  • Rax (‚≠ê8k) - A universal React-compatible render engine.

Contents / Components

Contents / Related Libraries

  • React (‚≠ê237k) - A declarative, efficient, and flexible JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
  • Inferno (‚≠ê16k) - An extremely fast, React-like JavaScript library for building modern user interfaces.

entry.title: Awesome Preact Updates on Apr 23, 2017
entry.content:
Contents / Boilerplates

  • Preact Offline Starter (‚≠ê387) - Webpack2 boilerplate for building SPA / PWA / offline front-end apps with Preact.
  • TypeScript Preact Starter (‚≠ê51) - Barebones starter project for Preact with TypeScript.
  • Preact Redux SSR Example (‚≠ê32) - Server-side Rendering with Redux Example.

Contents / Components

  • Preact Scroll Header (‚≠ê42) - A (800b gzip) header that will show/hide while scrolling for Preact.
  • Preact Progress (‚≠ê49) - Simple and lightweight (~590 bytes gzip) progress bar component for Preact.

Contents / Example Apps

  • Preact HN (‚≠ê296) - Demonstration of Preact used to build Hacker News as a PWA.
  • TodoMVC (‚≠ê105) - TodoMVC done in Preact. Under 6kb and fast.
